subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: While Cleveland Cavaliers Coach Mike Brown’s basketball résumé may be as short on playoff seasons (two) as that of his star, LeBron James, Brown does have experience in unfamiliar situations.
snippet: While Cleveland Cavaliers Coach Mike Brown’s basketball résumé may be as short on playoff seasons (two) as that of his star, LeBron James, Brown does have experience in unfamiliar situations.
